attributes.action: Change the law, notifying parents when a known paedophile lives in the area or moves to it so they can take steps to ensure their childs safety, perhaps in the form of a log book kept at local police stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A change in the law needs to be made, to enable parents to know who lives around them so they can safeguard their children,its time to protect the innocents not the criminals. The Colyn Evans case is a classic example of how all the services failed and ended up with the murder of Karen Dewar, after the authorities moved him to an area where he was unknown. had Karen's parents been aware the outcome might have been so different.In safeguarding these criminals identities it is endangering our children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
